pypi_registry: {{('' if cookiecutter.pypi_schema in ['', '-'] else cookiecutter.pypi_schema+'://') + cookiecutter.pypi_host_and_path + ('' if cookiecutter.pypi_port in ['', '-'] else (':'+cookiecutter.pypi_port))}}
docker_registry: {{('' if cookiecutter.docker_schema in ['', '-'] else cookiecutter.docker_schema+'://') + ('' if cookiecutter.docker_host in ['', '-'] else cookiecutter.docker_host) + ('' if cookiecutter.docker_port in ['', '-'] else (':'+cookiecutter.docker_port))}}
docker_image: {{(cookiecutter.docker_host if cookiecutter.docker_username in ['', '-'] else cookiecutter.docker_username) + '/' + cookiecutter.python_package}}
